Package solidbase.maven

Solidbase's Maven plugin.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Progress Implements the progress listener for the Maven plugin.
Secondary A secondary connection used during configuration of the Maven Plugin.
UpgradeMojo The Maven plugin for SolidBase.
 

Package solidbase.maven Description

Solidbase's Maven plugin. Provides classes for the Maven plugin. The UpgradeMojo makes it possible to upgrade the database through Maven.
